scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && ng build common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:demo-forge: ng build demo-forge --prod && npm publish ./dist/demo-forge --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-display-action: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-display-action && ng build lcu-el-display-action && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-display-action --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-display-charts: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-display-charts && ng build lcu-el-display-charts && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-display-charts --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-display-content: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-display-content && ng build lcu-el-display-content && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-display-content --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-display-json-view: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-display-json-view && ng build lcu-el-display-json-view && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-display-json-view --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-display-pointer: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-display-pointer && ng build lcu-el-display-pointer && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-display-pointer --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-layout-flex: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-layout-flex && ng build lcu-el-layout-flex && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-layout-flex --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-layout-stacked: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-layout-stacked && ng build lcu-el-layout-stacked && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-layout-stacked --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-layout-switch-state: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-layout-switch-state && ng build lcu-el-layout-switch-state && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-layout-switch-state --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-sln-applications: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-sln-applications && ng build lcu-sln-applications && npm publish ./dist/lcu-sln-applications --access public
